name: Hibiki / ヒビキ / 히비키 / 响 (Blue Archive)
description:
Nekozuka Hibiki (Blue Archive)

猫塚ヒビキ (ブルーアーカイブ) / 네코즈카 히비키 (블루 아카이브) / 猫塚响 (碧蓝档案)

Usage

※ Hibiki's outfits are rather complicated, so I have documented all of her tags here for your reference.  It may not be necessary to use all of them.

Use any or all of these tags to summon Hibiki: hibiki, bright pupils, halo, dog ears, dog tail, goggles on head

For her standard outfit: twintails, hair bobbles, engineering goggles, purple choker, multicolored jacket, black camisole, grey shirt, black shorts, fishnet pantyhose, dog tags

For her cheerleader alt: cheerleader, ponytail, crop top, wing collar, criss-cross halter, pleated miniskirt, pom pom (cheerleading), blue goggles

- Use cheerleader to strengthen or weaken the effect.

- If the stickers appear on incorrect outfits, add star sticker, sticker on face, sticker on arm to the negative prompt.

- If her name tag and collar appear on incorrect outfits, add wing collar to the negative prompt.

Calm expression: [light smile|expressionless], closed mouth

Embarrassed expression: blush, embarrassed, wavy mouth

Weapon: mortar (weapon), rocket, mortar shell, suitcase, M logo

Weight 0.9 - 1.0 should be ideal; the LoRA is very slightly overfit. I will re-train with fewer steps in the near future.

Refer to https://huggingface.co/khanon/lora-training for other Blue Archive characters, training parameters, and datasets.

modelVersions.name: v3
modelVersions.description:
• Retrained from scratch since Hibiki's previous LoRA was not very good.

  • Added many new images to the dataset, particularly for Hibiki's regular outfit.

  • Completely re-tagged the dataset.

    • Used WD1.4 swin-v2 as a starting point, then performed extensive manual editing and cleanup for accuracy and consistency.

    •  Added many new tags to better describe Hibiki's outfits and expressions.

  • Uses improved hyperparamters from my more recent models.
